text:
Hi Louise! Really lovely to meet you! Let me tell you some things about me! I am based in Bristol at Moonraker VFX, we work mostly in broadcast television but also do museum experiences and Flyrides. I worked in London for 19 years before here in GFX / VFX for advertising at a company called Mainframe. I am a producer here and look after several programmes at once.

<https://prospelamentors.slack.com/archives/CRVKT5QCU/p1576753056004800|[10:57 AM]>
Heres our reel for you to nosy at: <https://moonrakervfx.com/vfx-showreel>
I am on here most days, just checking in. Anything at all I can do to support you / point you in the right direction,  I am very happy to!

It would be lovely to meet you too. Maybe when you’re next down in London we could go for a coffee? 

I love science-y stuff so enjoyed the showreel very much! It must be interesting producing different projects at the same time; how do you manage it and is it challenging? 

At the moment I am just in the mindset of getting my foot through the door. How was it for you? I have been thinking about starting as a runner just to get a feel for the job and and understand the “inner workings” and what it involves. what advise would you give me? 

Can I please also attach a copy of my CV so you could give me some feedback? 

Looking forward to hearing back from you. 

Many thanks,
Louise
